title: Cate Blanchett’s ‘Tár’ Puts Mahler in the Spotlight
description: A 120-year-old piece by Gustav Mahler is finding new life with unlikely listeners after a star turn in “Tár.”
dc:creator: Louis Lucero II
media:credit: Photo illustration by Kyle Berger for The New York Times
media:description: Mahler’s Symphony No. 5, first performed in 1904, is having a 21st-century resurgence.
